name: Cookiecopter! Tasty Delivery Run
description:
Cookiecopter! A little game I made for the "Cookie Jam 2021" jam.

Credits to Gina Loughlin for the awesome music, check her out if you're in need of some music for your projects!

Controls:

- WASD: Move Helicopter

- E to pickup cookies

- SPACE to drop

There may be some bugs, but I hope you enjoy nonetheless!
